I called his play as many times as I possibly could, and it makes my job a lot easier, Phil Jacksonadelphia coach Jim O'Brien said. over the CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Google CEO Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page .
